snippet: Washington should be more responsive to legitimate concerns raised by residents of this Japanese island.
abstract: Editorial calls on Washington to be more responsive to legitimate concerns raised by Okinawans, whose resentment and anger at being unwilling hosts to American military personnel was further inflamed by alleged rape of local woman by two American sailors; urges Defense Department to impose stricter limits on its troops' behavior and to lighten its presence on Okinawa.
lead_paragraph: Washington should be more responsive to legitimate concerns raised by residents of this Japanese island.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
